name: PS5 Buying Sim
description:
Hello Electro Studios Fans,

Welcome to our holiday gift to you all the fans. We know that recently the highly awaited Playstation 5(owned by sony and playstation not me or any of the electro studios team members). To combat this in the holiday season we have decided to gift you all with this, a ps5 buying simulator. In it you go to the store a buy a ps5. We understand that it is not the real thing but se hope that you enjoy it and your holiday. 

Thank you for your patronage, have a great day and a great holiday,

-The Electro Studios Team
